game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, you are the last chronomancer tasked with restoring balance to the timestream. As you journey through the fragments of eras past and future, you must solve puzzles and defeat powerful entities to unravel the mystery behind the temporal catastrophe.
game.beginning: The game begins in the present day, where players find themselves in a world that is slowly descending into chaos. A catastrophic event known as 'The Great Dissonance' has caused time itself to fragment, and the fabric of reality is beginning to unravel.
game.ending: Ultimately, it is up to the player to navigate through the different eras and collect fragments of the timestream. By reassembling these fragments, they will be able to repair the damage done to time and restore balance to the world.
